channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street Curbs Young Bankers' Hours After Overwork Outcry
item.description: JPMorgan adds 80-hour weekly cap and Bank of America revamps timekeeping after a Wall Street Journal investigation highlighted investment banking’s wo...

item.title: Stellantis defends itself after US dealers flag concerns
U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Increase in Latest Week
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories rose for the first time in four weeks, and gasoline and distillate stocks increased amid lower demand, according to EIA dat...

item.title: Syra Health Announces Pricing of $2.1 Million Public Offering
How a Private-Equity Payday Drained a Hospital Chain of Cash
item.description: Steward Health Care recently went bust, years after paying a $790 million dividend to its shareholders.

item.title: Protests in Melbourne enter second day, police beef up security
Retirees Will Get a Smaller Social Security Raise in 2025---and That's OK
item.description: Next year’s cost-of-living adjustment is expected to be 2.5% as inflation cools.

item.title: Viking Announces Pricing of its Secondary Offering
Topgolf Sent Callaway Into the Rough
item.description: The recreational driving-range business has been a drag for the top golf-equipment maker.

item.title: Pan American Silver Reports Mineral Reserves and Mineral Resources as at June 30, 2024
